thread.section_title: Bottlestore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bottlestore | bottlestore.com
thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text: Phoned the Bottle Store for additional details which they were happy to provide, placed order online. Took about a week for order to get shipped (site says 2-3 days), but once sent it arrived very quickly (UPS Ground), and it was double-boxed with foam packing materials so everything arrived safely. The glass bottles and caps were as described and exactly what I wanted. Separate sample request also arrived very quickly and packaged well.
